item.title: HARTE HANKS INC 10-K
item.description: HARTE HANKS INC, which is in the Services-Direct Mail Advertising Services [7331] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 21, 2022 had 23671 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: december - 236 instances 2021 - 234 instances 31 - 228 instances stock - 205 instances 2020 - 193 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
